articles.description: Those expecting the streaming giant to take a Stadia-like approach to games will be disappointed - but what Netflix is doing instead could be more creative and interesting.

articles.author: Pranob Mehrotra
articles.title: POCO F3 GT undercuts the Nord 2 with even more aggressive pricing - XDA Developers
articles.description: POCO today lifted the covers off the new POCO F3 GT -- an affordable flagship phone that features a MediaTek Dimensity 1200 chipset.
articles.content: The affordable flagship segment in India is blowing up. Just yesterday, OnePlus lifted the covers off the OnePlus Nord 2 — a compelling device that offers several premium features at a relatively aff… [+3677 chars]
